/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of shops and restaurants, their colorful signs and awnings adding a vibrant touch to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of urban development and natural beauty.
